data.name: BaseIndex
desc: specifies the basic service of different indexes within a document.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.0

properties.name: BackColor
desc: specifies the color of the background.

properties.name: BackGraphic
desc: contains the graphic object that is displayed as background graphic.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: BackGraphicFilter
desc: contains the name of the filter of the graphic file that is displayed as background graphic

properties.name: BackGraphicLocation
desc: determines the position of the background graphic.

properties.name: BackGraphicURL
desc: contains the URL of a graphic file that is displayed as background graphic

Note the new behaviour since it this was deprecated: This property can only be set and only external URLs are supported (no more vnd.sun.star.GraphicObject scheme). When an URL is set, then it will load the graphic and set the BackGraphic property.

properties.name: BackTransparent
desc: If TRUE, the background color value in \"BackColor\" is not visible.

properties.name: ContentSection
desc: the text section containing the content of the index

properties.name: CreateFromChapter
desc: determines if the content of the document index is created from the complete document content or from the current chapter only.
It is not available in the bibliography

properties.name: HeaderSection
desc: the text section containing the header of the index

properties.name: IsProtected
desc: determines if the index is protected.

properties.name: LevelFormat
desc: returns the interface of the level format of the index.
The description of the format of the levels depends on the type of the document index.

properties.name: ParaStyleHeading
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the heading.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel1
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 1st level.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel10
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 10th level.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel2
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 2nd level.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel3
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 3rd level.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel4
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 4th level.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel5
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 5th level.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel6
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 6th level.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel7
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 7th level.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel8
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 8th level.

properties.name: ParaStyleLevel9
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the 9th level.

properties.name: ParaStyleSeparator
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is applied to the separator level.

properties.name: TextColumns
desc: contains the column interface.

properties.name: Title
desc: contains the title of the index.
